name: Beat Me! (early acces)
description:
Beat Me is a sprite based 2 player-only- action platformer in which players must compete in two diferent modes to see who scores the most points before time runs out. There are two modes available at launch: Beat Me & Gold Rush.

Beat Me: players must burst bubles of their corresponding colors to score points while dodging the black bubles and the falling bricks. They can also use switches to stop their rival´s bubles from spawning.

Gold Rush: the main objective here is to get the money bag and keep it as long as posible. But the other player can make this difficult by dropping power ups to claim the moneybag.

Features

  • Beautiful character and background design
  • Two very diferent modes
  • 4 selectable characters
  • 4 more levels to unlock
  • Endless arcade gameplay
  • Competitive gameplay: beat your friends!
